name: df-sumge0
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(csumge0, cmpt(s0, universe, cif(cpnf, csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(cdm(cv(s0))), cfn), csu(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), cxr, clt), wcel(cpnf, crn(cv(s0))))))
comment: Define the arbitrary sum of nonnegative extended reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.) $.
